title: Online Library Utilization Competency Enhancement Module

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A microlearning environment aimed at supporting language learning to enhance workplace efficiency for employees. Provides mobile-optimized content considering non-PC users

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for job-related professional resources in online libraries.
Learners can perform digital material borrowing and returning procedures based on scenario-driven tasks.
Learners can apply academic database access methods to context-specific case scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
